alert.message: The balance of one of the validators is below 32 ETH
alert.name: Balance below 32 ETH

targets.expr: (sum((validator_balance{package="$package"} and validator_balance{package="$package"} > 10)) - count(validator_balance{package="$package"} > 10)*32) - (sum((validator_balance{package="$package"} offset 1d and validator_balance{package="$package"} offset 1d > 10)) - count(validator_balance{package="$package"} offset 1d > 10)*32)

sum(validator_balance{package="$package"} and validator_balance{package="$package"} > 10) - count(validator_balance{package="$package"} > 10)*32 - (sum((validator_balance{package="$package"} offset 1d and validator_balance{package="$package"} offset 1d > 10) or vector(0)) - (count(validator_balance{package="$package"} offset 1d > 10) or vector(0))*32)

sum(validator_balance{package="$package"} and validator_balance{package="$package"} > 10) - count(validator_balance{package="$package"} > 10)*32 - (sum((validator_balance{package="$package"} offset 1w and validator_balance{package="$package"} offset 1w > 10) or vector(0)) - (count(validator_balance{package="$package"} offset 1w > 10) or vector(0))*32)

sum(validator_balance{package="$package"} and validator_balance{package="$package"} > 10) - count(validator_balance{package="$package"} > 10)*32 - (sum((validator_balance{package="$package"} offset 30d and validator_balance{package="$package"} offset 1w > 10) or vector(0)) - (count(validator_balance{package="$package"} offset 1w > 10) or vector(0))*32)

panels.description: This panel will count only the votes done since your validator process started
panels.title: Validator main info

panels.description: Should be remain on the same level. On average 1 attestation per validator per epoch (12s * 32 slots = 384s).  So per validator we should see on avg 9.375 attestations per hour.
panels.title: Successful Attestations & Aggregations per hour

alert.message: NODE ALERT: MORE THAN 50 SLOTS BEHIND THAN THE CHAIN
alert.name: NODE: More than 50 slots behind

alert.message: NODE/VALIDATOR: THE NODE OR VALIDATOR IS DOWN FOR MORE THAN 1 MINUTE
alert.name: NODE/VALIDATOR: Process down

alert.message: ALERT: THE NODE OR VALIDATOR HAS CRASHED
alert.name: NODE/VALIDATOR: Crashed

alert.message: VALIDATOR ALERT: THE EARNING IN THE LAST HOUR IS LESS THAN 0
alert.name: VALIDATOR: Hourly earning <= 0

alert.message: NODE ALERT: MORE THAN 50 ERRORS IN THE LAST HOUR
alert.name: NODE: More than 50 errors in 1h

alert.message: VALIDATOR ALERT: YOUR VALIDATOR HAS BEEN SLASHED
alert.name: VALIDATOR: Validator has been slashed

panels.description:
This graph is made for trading purpose mostly.
Supposing that if a lot of validators are exiting, price is gonna dump.

Also this can prevent to exit while exiting queue is too long, same for depositing while pending queue is too long.
panels.title: Total balance all validators

panels.description: This panel won't have consistant values during the first hour of the node started process
panels.title: Hourly log type counter
